column1: greater_banat_desc;With German villages and towns in the area now outside German control it would be in everyone's best interest for them to unify with Banat.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
french_blobmode_desc;There are still French European lands that aren't under our control
column2: we should push to integrate them into our own holdings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: canadian_blobmode_desc;The current regime demands that Canada's borders be extended and who would we be to say no?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: ah ha ha

column1: greater_yugo_desc;Yugoslavia is yet to encompass all lands of the southern slavs
column2: we must seek out and regain these lands for the good of the people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: persian_border_dispute_desc;The lands of Khuzestan have been dominated by Persia for too long! It is time for us to assert our rights and take back our own!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kurdish_diaspora_desc;Our Kurdish brothers are crying out for freedom
column2: we should bring them into our nation and return them to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_bulgarian_lands_desc;The Great Powers have denied Bulgaria her destiny
column2: that of ruling all Bulgarian peoples. Let us defy them
column3: and forge the greater Bulgaria we deserve!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bosnia_desc;The Great Powers have denied Bosnia her destiny
column2: that of ruling all the Bosniak peoples. Let us defy them
column3: and forge a greater Bosnia by removing the Serbs from the premises!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_slovene_lands_desc;The Slovene provinces of Trieste and Klagenfurt have been under foreign rulers for too long
column2: let us reclaim our land!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_kingdom_of_aragon_desc;The old kingdom of Aragon has to be reconquered for re-incorporation into the state
column2: now we have a chance to reinstate her and return our people to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_khmer_empire_desc;The Khmer Empire was once the greatest in Southern Asia
column2: let us reclaim our old lands and forge an empire that will stand against the powers of the West.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_armenia_desc;Armenia has a rightful claim on the lands to the west
column2: we must stake this claim and fight the Turks for it so we can unit with our brothers in Adana.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tibetan_empire_desc;The Tibetan Empire once ruled a vast land that was taken away from us by the barbarians. The Tibetan people still live in these lands and the time has come for us the claim whats historically ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we must reclaim it from the scum who overran it centuries ago.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_persia_desc;Now that Persia has westernized and become a power in her own right
column2: we can reclaim the lands of our forefathers from the conquerers who have taken them from us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_brittany_title;Staking our Claim on the Duchy of Anjou;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_brittany_desc;Our King has a distant claim on the Duchy of Anjou
column2: and although the time for such royal claims has passed
column3: we still feel that it is a valid enough reason to attempt to reclaim those lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_navarra_desc;The Basque have remained spread across Northern Spain for centuries
column2: and now that we've gained our independence we should extend our state to all the Basque peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_pashtun_regions_desc;Now that we've extended our realm to the Afsharid Dynasty holdings
column2: we can try to incorporate the Pashtun regions in Afghanistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_croatian_lands_desc;Bosnia was once an integral part of the Croatian Kingdom
column2: and even today our ethnic legacy carries on throughout Bosnia
column3: now that we have our sovereignty it is time for us to reclaim the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_republican_borders_desc;Since regaining our freedom from the Austrians our people have grown increasingly militaristic and the cries for retaking the provinces we lost to the Treaty of Campo Formio have grown to the point where they can no longer be ignored. It is time to reclaim our prominence in the Mediterranean.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_kingdom_of_leon_desc;For the first time in centuries the Leonese people are free from Castilian rule
column2: what better way to celebrate this than to reclaim our old holdings in Iberia?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_highlands_desc;For the first time in millenia the Assyrian peoples have a nation of their own
column2: let us extend it to all our peoples for the glory of god!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: alaskan_nationalism_desc;The borders of Free Alaska need to be extended
column2: our people freeze and starve in our tiny colony so the only logical choice is to move south.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_irredentism_desc;The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the unification of all territories in the immediate vicinity of Italy which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Ticino and Nice
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions for Dalmatia

column1: extending_to_danube_desc;Now that we've regained all our cultural land from the Turks and Austrians we should move to annex the province of Pancevo into our realm
column2: the Romanian minority is eager to join us and the province would extend our natural borders along the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_nederlander_desc;Numerous groups of our people exist outside the Netherlands currently
column2: it would be in our best interest to attempt to bring them back into the fold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_lith_desc;Now that we've gained our independence it is imperative to push the borders of Lithuania to our ethnic boundaries.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_mayan_lands_frca_desc;Now that Yucatan has joined our union
column2: we should unite all the Mayans under the flag of the Federal Republic.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mex_central_america_desc;The First Mexican Empire annexed Central America in 1822. Now that we have been considered a great power
column2: we should expand to the south

column1: greater_poland_desc;We can't let our brothers in East Prussia and Lithuania to stay under foreign rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
greater_norway_desc;We are a power to be reckoned with. It is time that we claimed the lands that are part of our heritage!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_tibet_desc;Tibet has long been a part of China
column2: but during the period of chaos it broke free. It's time to return the wayard son to its motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: refute_manifest_destiny2_desc;The American claims to our frontier have proven to be little more than empty air and bluster. Those lands belong to us
column2: and no other.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the territory known as Lands of the Crown of Saint Stephen was officially defined as "a state union of the Kingdom of Hungary and the Kingdoms of Dalmatia
column4: the Croats are pushing for uniting the Triune Kingdom under our flag. We should give them what they want - it would definitely help our economy and our dreams of becoming the main naval power of the Adriatic Sea.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: indonesia_raya_desc;"Indonesia Raya" - "Great Indonesia" - is the national anthem of Indonesia since its proclamation of independence. The song marked the birth of the all-archipelago nationalist movement in Indonesia that supported the idea of one single "Indonesia" rather than split into several colonies. The movement was born from a similar thought directed at the unification of the Melayu people. It ambitionned the union of the East Indies
column2: Dutch
column3: British and Portuguese into a country strong enough to fight off western imperialism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: melayu_raya_desc;Melayu Raya' is the name of the all-archipelago nationalist movement in South East Asia that supported the idea of one single country uniting the Malay people rather than split into several colonies. As such
column2: it ambitionned the union of the East Indies
column4: British and Portuguese into a country strong enough to fight off western imperialism. The Pan-Malay union was based on understandings on similarities in race
column6: religion and culture among ethnic groups. The ancient concept of Alam Melayu or Nusantara advocates an historical awareness that the territories were once united
column10: could and should be brought together once again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: add_lithuania_baltic_states_desc;Although not considered part of the Baltic States proper
column2: Lithuania is small enough to be added to the Baltic Adminstration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_caribbean_desc;We must claim the Greater Antilles to unite all the Caribbean islands under our Federation and to ensure our rule in the region by getting the most populous and important islands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_karelia_desc;We must claim Finnish Karelia and the Kola Peninsula to unite all Karelians under our flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_turkestan_desc;We must free our Uighur brothers from Chinese rule to unite all of the Central Asian Turkic people under our flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_siam_desc;We shall reclaim the lands ruled by the early Rattanakosin Kingdom to restore the glory of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

italia_irredenta_desc;The Italian Resurgence movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia
column3: and Austria.;Le mouvement irrédentiste voulait voir transférés à la couronne italienne tous les territoires limitrophes peuplés majoritairement ou en partie d'italiens. Cela concerne non seulement les possessions autrichiennes en Italie
column4: mais aussi des territoires en Dalmatie et en Autriche.;Die italienische Irredentistenbewegung strebte danach
column5: alle Gebiete in der unmittelbaren Umgebung des Königreichs Italien
column6: die tatsächlich oder vermeintlich größtenteils von Italienischstämmigen bewohnt wurden
column7: dem Königreich anzugliedern. Dies beinhaltete nicht nur Ansprüche auf österreichische Ländereien in italienischem Besitz
column8: sondern bedeutete auch territoriale Ansprüche weiter nach Dalmatien und Österreich hinein.;;El movimiento irredentista italiano aspiraba a obtener para Italia todos los territorios vecinos del joven reino que estaban
column9: mayoritaria o parcialmente poblados por personas de etnia italiana. Esto no solo incluía los territorios austriacos en Italia propiamente dicha
column10: sino también regiones diversas en Dalmacia y el interior de Austria.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_korea_desc;We must reclaim the lands once owned by the ancient Korean kingdoms of Koguryo and Balhae to unite all Koreans under our flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_israel_desc;Our promised homeland was the Mandate of Palestine
column2: which included Transjordan - and yet we haven't received it. We don't need the Great Powers' protection anymore
column3: it's time to take what's rightfully ours - and a lot more...;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_andinia_desc;The borders of the Jewish State must stretch from coast to coast
column2: all of Patagonia shall be ours!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_guiana_desc;Once there was a Jewish community in Dutch Guiana
column2: there shall be a lot more in all of Guiana!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_uganda_desc;The Jewish nation can't exists without a sea access
column2: we shall claim the rest of the Rift Valley and Kenya in order to fix this problem.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_angola_desc;We must expand beyond our borders and claim all of Angola under our flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_georgia_desc;We shall claim the lands inhabited by our Laz brothers to unite all Georgians under our flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_portugal_desc;We shall claim Galicia and free our Galician brothers from the Spanish oppression.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_germany_GER_desc;The German peoples are led by a government willing and able to do something about uniting the Germans living in foreign lands into the state
column2: so let us begin!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_germany_GCF_desc;The German peoples are led by a government willing and able to do something about uniting the Germans living in foreign lands into the state
column2: so let us begin!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_cascadia_desc;It's time to claim Alaska and Yukon to unite all of the Pacific Northwest under our flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_rhodesia_desc;We must claim Northern Rhodesia and Nyasaland in order to become the Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it's time to make our Paraguayan claims an integral part of our nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
it's time to make our Paraguayan claims an integral part of our nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_armenia_tca_desc;Armenia has a rightful claim on the lands to the west
column2: we must stake this claim and fight the Turks for it so we can unit with our brothers in Adana.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_california_desc;We are strong enough to reclaim all of Alta California and incorporate Baja California and Sonora into our glorious nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_rgr_desc;When we declared independence from Mexico we claimed the states of Durango
column2: Chihuahua and New Mexico. Now we are in a position to make these claims a reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
